title: How to Reshow the Inkscape Welcome Window

media:group.media:title: How to Reshow the Inkscape Welcome Window
media:group.media:description:
In this Inkscape tutorial I show you how to reshow the welcome window when opening Inkscape for a new session. This welcome window contains convenient features like choosing from a list of premade document templates, canvas and theme customizations, a dark mode toggle, and opening previous compositions. If you've accidently turned off showing the welcome window on restart, this tutorial will show you how to re-enable the feature so it opens every time you start a new Inkscape session.
